code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import firebase from'../Firebase/Firebase.js';import{auth}from'../Firebase/Firebase.js';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function SignIn(){useEffect(function(){var btnStyleEl=document.querySelector(".btnStyle");var sginBtnEl=document.querySelector(".sginBtn");btnStyleEl.style.display='none';document.querySelector(".AZChat .chatContainer .chatHeader").style.bottom="auto";document.querySelector(".AZChat .chatContainer .chatHeader").style.top="0rem";console.log(btnStyleEl,sginBtnEl);},[]);var signInWithGoogle=function signInWithGoogle(){var provider=new firebase.auth.GoogleAuthProvider();auth.signInWithPopup(provider);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"sginBtn",onClick:signInWithGoogle,children:"Sign in with Google"});}export default SignIn;
